item.title: WATCH: Trump threatens to 'go in and kill' Hamas members as violence in Gaza continues
item.description: President Trump threatened to "go in and kill" Hamas members in Gaza after a Hamas-linked gunmen appeared to carry out a public execution in Gaza this...

item.title: Sen. Mitch McConnell falls in Capitol hallway
item.description: The 83-year-old fell on his way to Senate votes.

item.title: Thune says he offered Dems a vote on Obamacare subsidies to end shutdown
item.description: Schumer said the GOP did not offer any proposal to vote to extend the subsidies.

item.title: B-52s fly off coast of Venezuela in show of force by Trump
item.description: Three bombers flew for hours off the coast of Venezuela on Wednesday.
